product_name: Shebeest Triple S Bike Shorts - Women's
long_description: Tried and true, the Shebeest Triple S 8-panel bike shorts are designed to give support for racing and intense training rides. DriStyle(TM) fabric wicks extraordinarily well, keeping you dry and comfortable when you're working hard. DriStyle fabric offers built-in temperature regulation, preventing you from heating up or cooling down too fast. DriStyle fabric's hidden benefit is that this temperature regulation helps reduce the likelihood of fatigue or sore muscles after workouts. Seamless, contoured SheLastic(TM) chamois uses variable-density padding in key areas for support, and all-way stretch for added comfort. Laser-cut chamios eliminates bulkiness and chafing, reducing pressure to contact areas. 8-panel, articulated construction moves with you. Flatlock seams are non-bulky and supple. Signature elastic leg grippers keep the Shebeest Triple S bike shorts in place.
short_description: Tried and true, the Shebeest Triple S 8-panel bike shorts are designed to give support for racing and intense training rides.
